hero.title: Premium Laundry Pickup & Delivery Service
hero.subtitle: Convenient door-to-door service by {{affiliateName}}, with professional washing by WaveMAX

doorToDoor.title: Door-to-Door Service
doorToDoor.description: {{affiliateName}} provides convenient pickup and delivery right at your doorstep, on your schedule.

professional.title: Professional WDF Processing
professional.description: WaveMAX handles the washing with state-of-the-art Electrolux 450G equipment and Omni LUX UV water purification in a quality-controlled facility.

fastTurnaround.title: Fast Turnaround
fastTurnaround.description: Your clothes are professionally cleaned and returned fresh, folded, and ready to wear - typically within 24-48 hours.

step1.title: Schedule Pickup
step1.description: Use our easy app to schedule a pickup time that works for your schedule

step2.title: Pickup at Your Door
step2.description: {{affiliateName}} collects your laundry and transports it to WaveMAX

step3.title: Professional Cleaning
step3.description: WaveMAX expertly washes, dries, and folds using premium equipment

step4.title: Delivery to You
step4.description: {{affiliateName}} delivers fresh, clean laundry back to your door

list.purification: Omni LUX UV water purification for cleanest results
list.transparent: Transparent pricing - pay for convenience & quality

quality.title: The WaveMAX Quality Difference
quality.subtitle: Your laundry is processed at WaveMAX's state-of-the-art facility

electrolux.title: Electrolux 450G Equipment
electrolux.description: Professional-grade washers and dryers ensure thorough cleaning and gentle care for all fabric types

omniLux.title: Omni LUX UV Purification
omniLux.description: Advanced UV water purification system eliminates 99.9% of bacteria and viruses for the cleanest wash possible

qualityControl.title: Quality Controlled
qualityControl.description: Strict quality control processes ensure consistent results and proper handling of every garment

cta.title: Ready to Experience Premium Laundry Service?
cta.subtitle: Let {{affiliateName}} handle the pickup and delivery while WaveMAX ensures professional cleaning

footer.copyright: Â© {{year}} CRHS Enterprises, LLC. Service provided by {{affiliateName}}
